name: Vinyls Collector
description:
Vinyls Collector

The game about sad humanoid, only one way to make him happier is to collect vinyls and reach the end of the level - play his favourite vinyl in gramophone. 

Collecting vinyls increases jump force and movement speed. 

Collect vinyls - to move through levels faster, but not always easier :) 

Enjoy the game. :) 

Game is not finished, but I am really happy I finished it until BTP Game Jam ends! :)
